DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multi-site study reverse modest elevation fast blood sugar ( prediabetes ) rest blood pressure ( Prehypertension ) co exist prediabetes prehypertension increase blood level vitamin D. This may reduce chance develop diabetes high blood pressure later life .
DOC.brief_title: Prediabetes , Prehypertension Vitamin D Supplementation - A Practice Based Clinical Intervention Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Study visit measure temperature , fast glucose , rest blood pressure , respiratory rate , height , weight waist circumference . A brief medical History take , follow abbreviated physical exam . A blood test check vitamin D level routine chemistry include complete lipid profile , liver kidney function complete . Based fast glucose and/or rest blood pressure one three arm : prediabetes ( arm 1 ) , prehypertension ( arm 2 ) co-existing prediabetes prehypertension ( arm 3 ) . After determine arm study , randomly assign receive either placebo vitamin D supplementation . If first arm prediabetes ( fast glucose 100-125 mg/dL ) , primary outcome measure change fast glucose 8 week , 16 week every 3 month study 5 year . If second arm prehypertension ( rest blood pressure 120-139/80-89 mm Hg ) , primary outcome measure change rest blood pressure 8 week , 16 week every 3 month study 5 year . If third arm prediabetes prehypertension , measure take 8 week , 16 week every 3 month study 5 year . A repeat blood test check vitamin D level do 8 16 week ( periodically necessary ) study . Other measure take routine doctor 's office .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Female 18 year old present The America Family Practice , Physicians Care Center office Egan Wellness Clinic/AntiAging & Skin Care Spa . Agreeable treatment placebo vitamin D 1000IU twice day food . Women pregnant nursing Anyone chronic medical condition require regular intake prescription medication .
